item.title: Irfani add a quote by Andrea Hirata
item.description:
"Jika berfikir positif, ternyata mengenal seseorang secara emosional memberikan akses pada sebuah bank data kepribadian tempat kita belajar banyak hal baru.
" -- Andrea Hirata

item.title: Irfani add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Irfani add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Irfani add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Irfani add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Irfani add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Irfani add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Irfani add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Irfani add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Irfani add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Irfani add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Irfani add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Irfani add a quote by Elbert Hubbard
item.description: "A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you." -- Elbert Hubbard

item.title: Irfani add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "That which does not kill us makes us stronger." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Irfani add a quote by Theodore Roosevelt
item.description: "Do what you can, with what you have, where you are." -- Theodore Roosevelt

item.title: Irfani add a quote by Hasan Al-Banna
item.description: "Kebahagiaan kita tidak terletak pada harta, tidak pada penampilan diri, tidak jugapada gemerlap perhiasan dan keindahan dunia. Ukuran kebahagiaan terkait erat pada hati dan ruh manusia yang mendamba ridha Tuhannya." -- Hasan Al-Banna

item.title: Irfani add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Irfani add a quote by Andrea Hirata
item.description: "Bermimpilah, karena Tuhan akan memeluk mimpi-mimpi itu." -- Andrea Hirata

item.title: Irfani add a quote by Sapardi Djoko Damono
item.description: "Aku mencintaimu. Itu sebabnya aku takkan pernah selesai mendoakan keselamatanmu" -- Sapardi Djoko Damono

item.title: Irfani add a quote by Salim A. Fillah
item.description: "Menikah itu sekarang hanya sekedar keraguan ikhwan dan penantian akhwat…" -- Salim A. Fillah
